education.school: Motilal Nehru National Institute of Technology Allahabad

projects.name: E-commerce Customer Segmentation using K-Means Clustering
projects.description: Segmented customers of an E-commerce platform based on their purchasing behaviour to improve customer satisfaction. Collected and preprocessed customer data to apply K-means clustering, determining clusters using Elbow Method and Silhouette Score. Examined segments to provide insights for personalised marketing strategies.

projects.name: Pizza Sales Analysis and Visualisation
projects.description: Analysed and visualised pizza sales data to uncover trends, optimise inventory, and enhance decision making. It is a data analysis and visualisation initiative focused on the analysis and visualisation of sales data from a fictional pizza restaurant chain. SQL is utilised for data extraction and transformation, while Power BI is employed for data visualisation. The projects goal is to provide insights to assist in improving sales, optimising operations, and enhancing customer satisfaction for the pizza restaurant chain.

projects.name: Customer Feedback Analysis
projects.description: Evaluated customer feedback and identified key areas of improvement. Built a sentiment analysis tool to assess and analyze large volumes of customer feedback, and help prioritize areas for improvement for Happay.

experiences.description: Market research and Analysis: Conducted research to understand the needs and preferences of the target audience, identify trends, and analysed the effectiveness of current strategies. Data Analysis: Inspected sales data to identify patterns, trends, and opportunities for improvement. Prepared reports and presentations based on findings.
Campaign Management: Assisted in planning, executing, and monitoring marketing campaign aimed at raising awareness and promoting the organisations initiatives and programs.
